name: Stremthru+
author: MunifTanjim + Runtipi community
description: Companion for Stremio - acts as an interface for external content stores with proxy capabilities.
short_desc: Stremio companion with content proxy support.

form_fields.label: User ID (PUID)
form_fields.hint: User ID to run the container as (default: 1000)

form_fields.label: Group ID (PGID)
form_fields.hint: Group ID to run the container as (default: 1000)

form_fields.label: Redis URI
form_fields.hint: Redis connection URI (auto-configured if Redis is enabled)

form_fields.label: Enable PostgreSQL
form_fields.hint: Enable PostgreSQL database (uses SQLite by default)

form_fields.label: Database URI
form_fields.hint: Database connection URI (auto-configured based on database choice)

form_fields.label: PostgreSQL Database Name
form_fields.hint: PostgreSQL database name (used when PostgreSQL is enabled)

form_fields.label: PostgreSQL Username
form_fields.hint: PostgreSQL username (used when PostgreSQL is enabled)

form_fields.label: PostgreSQL Password
form_fields.hint: PostgreSQL password (used when PostgreSQL is enabled)

form_fields.label: Stremio Addon URL
form_fields.hint: Stremio addon endpoint URL (optional, auto-configured if not set)
